trans-unit.source: Holds information about the record fields to be used for slug generation. To use multiple fields add a comma between the field keys. If you want to define a fallback field, separate the field keys with a pipe. Example: nav_title|title,other_field
This value will divide the slug parts. If a section value contains this very value, it will be replaced by the value given in fallbackCharacter.
It allows to replace strings of a slug part. The first entry is the search string and the second entry is the replace string.
Character that represents the separator of slug sections, that contain the fieldSeparator.
Defines whether a slug field should contain a prepending slash, e.g. for nested categories with speaking segments
A non-empty value is required in the field
Same as “alphanum” but allows also “_” and “-” chars
Allows a domain name such as “example.com”
Server-side validation of an email address
Will convert the input value to its md5-hash
Removes all occurrences of space characters
An empty value will be stored as NULL in the database
Attention: Influences default value and ranges
Requires the field to be unique for the whole table
Requires the field to be unique for the current PID
Define in how many columns the checkboxes should be displayed. Can be a value between 1-31 or inline. Default: 1
Register item groups for use in items.
Sort items by value or label.
Optionally define one or more checkboxes with additional options. Default is one single checkbox. Multiple checkboxes will be put together in a checkbox-group.
title1, value1, icon1, description1 title2, value2, icon2, description2 title3, value3, icon3, description3 ...
If set, all select groups are initially expanded (only for selectCheckbox).
The checked state of each checkbox corresponds to the bitset representation of the default value.
The button “Select & upload file” will be rendered
Whether the button "Add media by URL" should be rendered
Decide which online media helpers to provide
Sets the list of allowed file extensions (comma separated)
Show all child-records collapsed (if false, all are expanded)
Show only one child-record expanded each time
Overwrites the title of the “New record” link with a localised string
Hides or displays the element browser button in inline records
Overrides the link text and title of the “Create new relation” button with a localised string
If the accordant values are set, the control is shown or hidden in the header of each record.
Show unlocalized records which are in the original language, but not yet localized
Show a “synchronize” link to update to a 1:1 translation with the original language
Show the “localize all records” link to fetch untranslated records from the original language
Show records which were once localized but do not exist in the original language anymore
Defines where to show the “New record” link in relation to the child records
If disabled, the "New record" link button is removed.
Choose one or more content elements, which should be selectable by the user.
Keep the value or data from original language
Localize Records when Content Element is localized
Allows to select from three options: Copy from default language, copy from source language or set own value.
Field that should be used as label for inline element (starting with tx_mask_)
Pointing to the icon file to use for the table. Icons should be square SVGs.
Comma separated list of allowed file extensions
The first entry is the displayed title and the second entry is the value. Values must be integers.
Specifying a folder from where files are added to the item array
List of extensions to select. If blank, all files are selected. Specify list in lowercase.
Depth of directory recursions. Default is 99. Specify in range from 0-99. 0 (zero) means no recursion into subdirectories.
Minimum height of the box in FormEngine. The behaviour depends on the renderType.
Maximum height. The height of the box will automatically be adjusted to the number of selected elements.
Maximum number of child items. Defaults to a high value.
Minimum number of child items. Defaults to 0.

First value is the item label. Second value is the value of the item. Third value is an optional icon. Fourth value is an item group. Fifth value is an optional description text (only selectCheckBox). Icon path either with "EXT:" prefix or icon identifier.
The item-array will be filled with records from the table defined here
The items from foreign_table are selected with this WHERE-clause
Configures the internal type of the “group” type of element
Maximal number of elements to be displayed by default.
List of sys_category uids that exclude any other category.
Allows to set multiple records as roots.
Whether to show the header of the tree that contains a field to filter the records and allows to expand or collapse all nodes.
Whether to show the tree with all nodes expanded.
Comma-separated list of levels that will not be selectable, by default the root node (which is “0”) cannot be selected.
Shortcut to edit referenced elements directly in a popup.
Directly create and add a related record.
Adds a button to paste records from a clipboard.
Open the list module for the first allowed table.
Render an overview of the selected records.
Render a list of allowed tables and link to element browser.
Render thumbnails of icons below the select drop-down.
Renders a button to open element browser.
Allows the same item more than once in a list.
Default value when a new record is created
The characters in the input should be found in this string
Add RSA encryption prior to being submitted
Controls the autocomplete attribute of a given input field
To set the textarea to the full width of the form area, use the value 50. Default is 30
The number of rows in the textarea. Default is 5. Max value is 20.
This is an example code for your frontend template.
On first creation of a contentelement this code is saved into the target folder, which you have specified in the extensionmanager configuration. Default is
for more details on how to format the output.
This field is in use in more than one content element.
If you change this field, changes will affect other content elements.
Fluid-Template of this element is missing
Create at least one Backendlayout in module "List".

Do you want to delete the content element? "Delete" only deletes the configuration. "Purge" deletes the configuration and all the corresponding template files. The content in the database can be deleted via the install tool.
Directory is missing. Create missing directory or change configuration in extension manager.
Mask configuration mask.json is missing. Create missing file or change configuration in extension manager.
Missing directories and files were created.
Shows additional fields for images: alternative, link and cropping.
Mind that changes in the validation also affect already existing content of these elements:
The label of this field. Can be a LLL-string.
Short and helpful description for your editors
How the value should be added
Enables a fixed-width font (monospace) for the text field
Enabling this allows to use tabs in a text field
One or more fields are missing or are invalid. Please fill in the marked fields correctly and press save again.
If enabled the following options show buttons with special functionalities next to the field.
If enabled the following options render helpful lists and buttons below the field.
You can change the label later in "Settings".
You can change the key later in "Settings".
Click this button to reset all settings of this field to the default values.
The system extension rte_ckeditor is required for this field.
Element "%s" is missing in Mask definition.
Your extension configuration setup is incomplete. Please refer to the documentation on how to set up Mask properly.

You can auto-configure Mask by providing an extension key. Mask will create default paths inside the provided extension.
The extension must be loaded.
The JsonLoader merges all elements into one big json file. Whereas the JsonSplitLoader will split them into separate files.
Migrations of your Mask definition were performed on the fly. Please update your Mask definition for better performance.
Something went wrong while trying to persist your Mask definition.
